alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 1:25PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with heavy rainfall will impact portions of northern Rock, northeastern Brown, northwestern Holt, Keya Paha and southwestern Boyd Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 123 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking Thunderstorms with heavy rainfall extending from 7 miles southwest of Wewela to 6 miles north of Atkinson. Movement was southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rainfall, winds in excess of 30 mph,and small hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Springview, Atkinson, Stuart, Newport, Dustin, Burton, Thomas Creek State Wildlife Management Area and Mariaville. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 209 and 225. Highway 20 between mile markers 272 and 292. Highway 12 between mile markers 30 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
